revised_title: A Study of Oocyte Growth in Antedon: Cellular Metabolism and Structural Changes
tldr: This study investigates the growth of the oocyte in Antedon bifida, focusing on the cell metabolism and structural changes. The research examines the role of the nucleolus, chromatin, and cytoplasm in the growth process, as well as the formation of yolk and the germinal vesicle's size and shape.
